problem_text:
(B. I. Plotkin). Do there exist locally nilpotent torsion-free groups without the property RN ∗?
Yu. I. Merzlyakov
answer: Yes, such groups do exist (E. M. Levich, A. I. Tokarenko, Siberian Math. J., 11 (1970), 1033–1034; A. I. Tokarenko, Trudy Rizhsk. Algebr. Sem., Riga Univ., Riga, 1969, 280–281 (Russian)).
